attributes.action: Conduct ALL Brexit negotiations in the open.
attributes.additional_details: Too much bickering and self interest is being demonstrated by our so called representatives and WE MUST BE ALLOWED TO WITNESS EVENTS AS THEY ARE TALKED ABOUT SO THAT WE CANNOT HAVE THE WOOL PULLED OVER OUR EYES BY OUR DISINGENUOUS ELECTEDS.
attributes.background: It is becoming increasingly clear that our politicians are not representing our best interests in negotiations with the EU over Brexit.  This is because they are being held in secret and we will NEVER know what was actually  being said.  We MUST be able to scrutinise what is being said and written.

rejection.details:
The UK Government can't make this decision on its own.

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to agree with the EU that the negotiations should be conducted in public.
